name: 2D Pixel fighting game
description:
This is my first Mobil game. I hope you can enjoy. İf you have any feedback for my game you should send me mail with this e-mail adress aqwwwe73@gmail.com

I know this game have so much bugs.. 

    --STORY--

there is have a man, strong, brave, fearless..

this man's missions save the Queen. the last kingdom's Queen. Save her from skeleton and many enemys. She is our last hope...

--GAME--

This game have 2D pixel Grapichs and platformer stuff. You can controll your character with button on the left. Also for fighting use Button on the Right.
